name: Lovely Themes Magic Match - Love Game
name_original: Lovely Themes Magic Match - Love Game
description:
"Lover Kissing Flip is the best lover app for the iPhone."
"Great way to make a woman laugh!"

Easy puzzle game for both kids and adults.

Puzzle Game is to improve memory skills for everyone.
So easy to play: Just flip over two cards, if they match they will appear, if they don't ... try to remember their position and flip over and over more cards. There are so many kinds of different cards you can download to play for fun.

Play this puzzle game to enjoy its beautiful graphic and wonderful sound with music in game.

Super addictive, great graphics, and bonus power-ups!
